original_text: After the Israelites left Rephidim, they went into the Sinai desert. The Israelites put up their tents in the desert, at the side of Sinai mountain. That happened on the first day of the third month since they came out of Egypt.
korean_text: 그들이 르비딤을 떠나 시내 광야에 이르러 그 광야에 장막을 치되 이스라엘이 거기 산 앞에 장막을 치니라

sentences.original_text: they went into the Sinai desert
The Israelites put up their tents in the desert
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 광야에 그들의 천막을 쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: at the side of Sinai mountain
That happened on the first day
since they came out of Egypt
